titleStmt.title: A briefe instruction By way of dialogue, concerninge the principall poyntes of Christian religio[n], gathered out of the holy scriptures, lathers, and councels. By the Reuere[n]de M. George Doulye priest.
titleStmt.author: Warford, William, 1560-1608.

notesStmt.note: George Doulye is a pseudonym for William Warford.
STC suggests Seville as actual place of publication, and F. Perez as printer.
Leaves 37-38 missing in number only; 48 and 133 misnumbered 46 and 132.
Running title reads: An instruction of Christian religion.
Includes: "A briefe manner of examination of conscience for a generall confirmation", with caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
